class cardlib.Hand¶

Bases: object

A class that constructs a hand

The class can add new cards to its hand and drop cards. The class can sort its hand The class can call on the PokerHand class to compute the best hand out of the cards and its value

add_card(draw)¶

Adds the top card from the deck to the hand

Parameters

draw – (Class object)

Return (NoneType)

None

best_poker_hand(cards)¶

Adds the hand’s cards and the external cards from the table to create a list of all available cards to combine with and make a poker hand. The method calls on the PokerHand class with the cards as input to create the best poker hand :param cards: (list) a list of cards :return poker_hand:

drop_cards(drop_list)¶
Parameters

drop_list –

Returns

sort()¶

Sorts the cards in the hand by value then suit

Return (list)

List of the sorted cards

class cardlib.HandType(value)¶

Bases: enum.Enum

An enum class that gives every hand type a value depending on its strength in poker

class cardlib.PlayingCard(suit)¶

Bases: object

Superclass that overloads its functions to the cards’ subclasses

abstract get_value()¶

For the given card it returns its value

Return(integer)

Returns the value of the card

class cardlib.PokerHand(cards)¶

Bases: object

Class that controls the following hand types and its values with a list of cards as input: High card One pair Two pair Three of a kind Straight Flush Full house Four of a kind Straight flush

The class is overloaded with the < and == operators which makes it possible to compare two of the same class objects

check_flush()¶

Checks for the best flush in a list of cards

if it’s a flush :return (tuple): The value of highest card in the flush then the next highest and repeats to the lowest card if not :return (NoneType): None

check_four_of_a_kind(count)¶

Checks for the highest four of a kind in a list of cards

Parameters

count – (list) count list of the cards with how many of the same there are and where they are index if it has four of a kind it

Return (tuple)

The value of highest four of a kind then the highest card value of the kickers if not

Return (NoneType)

None

check_full_house(count)¶

Checks for the highest full house in a list of cards

Parameters

(list) – count list of the cards with how many of the same value there are and where they are index

if the list has a full house :return (tuple): The value of the highest three of a kind then the value for the highest pair if not :return (NoneType): None

check_pair(count)¶

Checks for the best pairs in a list of cards

Parameters

(list) – count list of the cards with how many of the same value there are and where they are index

if it has a pair :return (tuple): The value of the pair then the value of the three highest kickers with the highest value first if not :return (NoneType): None

check_poker_hand_value()¶

Checks the value of the poker hand by using all check functions

Param

self

Returns

(tuple): The poker hand’s value described in a tuple.

check_straight()¶

Checks for the best straight in a list of cards

if it’s a straight :return (tuple): The value of highest card in the flush then the next highest and repeats to the lowest card if not :return (NoneType): None

check_straight_flush()¶

Checks for the best straight flush in a list of cards

if it’s a straight flush :return (tuple): The value of highest card in the straight flush if not :return (NoneType): None

check_three_of_a_kind(count)¶

Checks for the best three of a kind in a list of cards

Parameters

(list) – count list of the cards with how many of the same value there are and where they are index

if it has three of a kind :return (tuple): The value of highest card of threes then the highest kicker value if not :return (NoneType): None

check_two_pair(count)¶

Checks for the best two pairs in a list of cards

Parameters

(list) – count list of the cards with how many of the same value there are and where they are index

if it has two pairs :return (tuple): The value of highest pair then the value of next highest pair then the value for the highest kicker if not :return (NoneType): None

get_count()¶

Creates a list of the cards with how many of the same value there are and where they are index in the list of cards

Return (list)

count list of the cards with how many of the same value there are and where they are index

its_high_cards()¶

Gives the highest cards from a list of cards

Return (tuple)

The value of the highest card then next 4 highest value cards in order

class cardlib.StandardDeck¶

Bases: object

Constructs a deck of 52 cards The class has functions to draw a card from the deck and shuffle the deck.

draw()¶

Removes the top card from the deck and returns it

Return (class object)

A card taken from top of the deck

shuffle()¶

Shuffles the deck

Return (class object)
